definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 2 mpl. [[תִּשְׁבְּרוּ]] De 2:6, 1 pl. [[נִשְׁבְּרָה]] Ge 43:4; Imv. mpl. [[שִׁבְרוּ]] Ge 42:2 +; Inf. cstr. [[לִשְׁבּׂר]] v:Ge 42:3 +, [[לִשְׁבָּר־]] v:Ge 42:7 +; Pt. mpl. [[שׁׂבְרִים]] Ge 47:14;—buy grain for food Ge 41:57 (v:Ge 41:56 v.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 1 pl. [[נַשְׁבִּיר]] Am 8:6, etc.; Pt. [[מַשְׁבִּיר]] Ge 42:6, Pr 11:26;—sell grain (prop. cause to buy grain), c. [[ל]] pers. Ge 42:6 + v:56 (read [[וַיַּשְׁבֵּר]] for MT [[וַיִּשְׁבּׂר]] Ol Di Gunk), c. acc. [[שֶׁבֶר]] Am 8:5, [[מַפַּל בָּר]] v:Am 8:6, cf. Pr 11:26; c. sf. pers. + acc. [[אׂכֶל]] + [[ב]] pret. De 2:28.
